text: Gary John Bassett (June 6, 1948 â€“ September 10, 2018), known as Johnny Strike, was an American singer-songwriter and crime novelist. He was born in San Francisco, California. He was mostly known as songwriter for the proto-punk band Crime based in San Francisco. In 2004, he wrote Ports of Hell alongside William S. Burroughs. Strike died on September 10, 2018 in San Francisco from liver cancer at the age of 70.Johnny Strike, Frontman of SF Punk Band Crime, Dead at 70 ==References== ==Other websites== * Rudos and Rubes * An oral history of Crime * Crime Radio * Amoeblog * Murder by Guitar Category:1948 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in San Francisco Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American guitarists Category:American novelists Category:Writers from San Francisco Category:Musicians from San Francisco Category:Singers from San Francisco
title: Johnny Strike
